name: 80 Day Race BV
goal:
80 Day Race will organise a sustainable zero-emission competition. It's an around the world challenge for clean road legal vehicles.
Worldwide televised, it's a great platform to increase the desirability of these vehicles.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Environment, Transport
euInitiatives:
Anything related to zero-emission mobility.
We offer the EU an opportunity to increase the visibility and desirability of zero-emission mobility through a global media event.
